誜字的基本解释

誜
shuà
妄言。
俊言。

誜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuà］
［《廣韻》所化切，去禡，生。］
(1)俊言。
(2)作人名用字。宋有赵师誜。见《宋史·宗室世系表四》。

誜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誜； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1163第05
【玉篇】【廣韻】所化切【集韻】數化切，?傻去聲。俊言也。一曰妄言。　又人名。師誜，見【宋史·宗室表】。

誜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
誜字的起名意思

暂无。

誜
Basic explanation of words
誜
shuà
Nonsense.
Jun Yan.
誜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuà］
[The cut in "Guang Yun", go to 禡, and give birth. ]
(1) Jun Yan.
(2) Use words for names. Song You Zhao Shixun. See "Song History · Clan Lineage Table IV".
誜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　誜; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1163 05
[Jade articles] [Guangyun] The cut and cut [Jiyun] The cut by number,? Silly. Jun Yan also. One said nonsense.　Another name. Master He, see [Song History·Clan List].
